src:
Kembali Mesra, Kombinasi Lionel Messi-Luis Suarez Jadi Senjata Andalan Barcelona?
01 Nov 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona beruntung memiliki penyerang-penyerang ajaib seperti Lionel Messi dan Luis Suarez. Dua nama tersebut berulang kali menyelamatkan tim pada pertandingan-pertandingan sulit.
Awal musim 2019/20 ini tidak terlalu mudah bagi Messi. Dia terpaksa melewatkan beberapa pekan pertama karena cedera panjang, juga terpaksa menepi lagi setelah pulih, meski yang kedua tidak terlalu lama.
Ernesto Valverde merancang proses integrasi Messi ke dalam skuad secara perlahan. Baru sepekan terakhir Messi benar-benar kembali seperti seharusnya, yang terbukti pada performa luar biasa kala Barca menghajar Real Valladolid 5-1.
Bagaimana apiknya kombinasi Messi-Suarez? Baca selengkapnya di bawah ini ya, Bolaneters!
text:
Back Intimate, Combination of Lionel Messi-Luis Suarez So Barcelona's Main Weapon?
Nov 1, 2019, 10:00 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Barcelona is fortunate to have magical attackers like Lionel Messi and Luis Suarez. The two names repeatedly saved the team in difficult matches.
The start of the 2019/20 season was not too easy for Messi. He was forced to spend the first few weeks due to a long injury, also forced to pull over again after recovering, although the second was not too long.
Ernesto Valverde slowly designed the process of integrating Messi into the squad. Only the last week Messi really returned as it should, which is proven in the extraordinary performance when Barca beat Real Valladolid 5-1.
How neat is the Messi-Suarez combination? Read below, Bolaneters!
